analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xb2c1126d0d41a78ac24dfb1a2369d6aaf4f5df43.sol:
	Contract MegatearsToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xb2c1126d0d41a78ac24dfb1a2369d6aaf4f5df43.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/32/0xb2c1126d0d41a78ac24dfb1a2369d6aaf4f5df43.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
